El grupo Rios de Agua Viva está conformado por cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Socorro  de 36 años quien se dedica al comercio de ropa desde hace 2 años con unos ahorro luego empezó a prestar y el negocio fue creciendo. Ella es casada y tiene seis hijos de los cuales solo los menores están a su cargo de 11, 5 y 2 años de edad respectivamente. 
Los otros integrantes son Carla Patricia de 27 años se dedica a la venta de frijoles y maíz hace 2 años, Bertha Lourdes de 40 años comercializa huevo, pan, gaseosas y helados y María Antonia de 31 años compra y vende res.
texts.en:
The “Ríos de Agua Viva” group is composed of four hardworking, enterprising people.  One of them is Socorro, 36, who has been a clothes merchant for two years.  She started the business using some of her savings and then started taking out loans and the business grew.  She’s married and has six children but only the youngest ones who are 11, 5 and 2 years old are still in her care.

The other group members are Carla Patricia, 27, who has been selling beans and corn for the last two years, Bertha Lourdes, 40, who sells eggs, bread, soft-drinks and ice-cream and María Antonia, 31, who is a beef merchant.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Felicitas: es soltera y la socia tiene 51 años de edad y tiene 3 hijos,la socia sigue teniendo el negocio de elaboracion y venta de panes,la socia sigue vendiendo en forma ambulatoria,ella elabora todos los dias panes y los vende en el distrito de Oropesa,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de elaboracion y venta de panes . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina,manteca y aceite al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Felicitas, 51, is the borrower.  She’s single and has three children.  She continues with her bakery business making and selling bread.  She’s still a street vendor.  She bakes bread every day and sells it in Oropesa District.  She works from 8am until 5pm and supports her children through this business.  She wants to expand and improve her bread baking and selling business and is asking for a loan to buy ingredients like flour, shortening and oil at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and pledges to meet her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like flour, shortening and oil at wholesale.

loans.name: Mikoadomé

texts.fr:
Mikoadomé est  un homme âgé  de 45 ans. Il est marié å un/e coiffeuse avec 06 enfants en charge.
Mikoadomé travaille comme plombier et vend en même temps des matériaux de construction. depuis 2010. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité. Il achète les produits chez les grossistes à Lomé et revend dans une boutique.
Mikoadomé a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des tuyaux, 01 tonne de ciment.
texts.en: Mikoadomé is a 45-year old man. He is married to a hair dresser and has six children in his care.   Mikoadomé works as a plumber and also sells construction materials, since 2010. One additional person helps him in his business. He buys his supplies from wholesalers in Lomé and resells them in a store. Mikoadomé has requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy some pipes and one ton [about 2200 lbs] of concrete.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es:
La Sra Mirna tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su pareja el Sr. Jorge quien trabaja en una firma privada desempeñando la Funcion de Basculero, juntos tienen dos hijos menores de edad.
Mirna se dedica a las confecciones, realiza trabajos sobre pedido como sabana, cortina, cubre sofa, busos para escuela ect. desde hace 8 meses. Comenzó con un pequeño capital que obtuvo a través de un credito de la Fundación Paraguaya y también gracias a la ayuda de su pareja, juntos pudieron montar dicha actividad. Hoy día ambos generan ingresos y aportan a la canasta familiar.
Actualmente posee clientela formada, pues, su negocio esta  ubicado en una zona muy poblada, cerca de una escuela.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, lo cual es el elemento fundamental de su trabajo. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
Mirna, 30, lives with her spouse, Jorge, who works for a private firm as a scale operator; they have two minor children.

Mirna is a seamstress.  She makes items to order like sheets, curtains, sofa covers, school sweatshirts, etc.  She’s been in business 8 months.  She started out with a little capital that she got from a loan from Fundación Paraguaya and also with help from her spouse.  They were able to start up the business together.  Today, they both generate income and contribute to the household’s basic needs.

She has a well-established clientele now because her business is located in a highly populated area near a school.

She is asking for the loan to buy fabric which is the fundamental material for her work.  She thanks the Fundación for the opportunity it gives her.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Madame Aminata est âgée  de 66 ans. Elle vit au Sénégal  et s’active dans le commerce depuis plusieurs années. Elle est mariée  et mère de 6 enfants majeurs. Elle pratique la vente de vaisselles et de produits divers régulièrement utilisés par les femmes dans les ménages. Elle et sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis aout 2001. Elle sollicite un crédit de 350 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de vaisselles a revendre. Son souhait est de développer son activité et accroitre ses bénéfices.
texts.en: Aminata is 66 years old.  She lives in Senegal and has been working in commerce for several years.  She is married and has six grown-up children.  She sells dishes and other products which are regularly used by women doing their housework.  Aminata has been a member of one of U-IMCEC's offices since August 2001.  She is requesting this loan for 350,000 francs to buy dishes to re-sell.  She would like to develop her business activity and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy dishes to re-sell

loans.name: Lidiya

texts.ru:
Лидия замужем, ее дети уже взрослые и самостоятельные. Лидия занимается реализацией красивого женского белья на центральном рынке своего родного города Новомосковска. Ее товар всегда подобран со вкусом для покупателя требовательного к высокому качеству. В этой сфере Лидия работает более 10 лет.  

Лидия планирует использовать кредит в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы купить новые модели белья, а также обновить ассортимент пижам. Она надеется разнообразить свой ассортимент и иметь возможность предлагать товар высокого качества для женщин разных возрастов и с разными предпочтениями. Лидия однозначно предприниматель со вкусом, который находится на своем месте и умеет выбирать и предлагать хороший товар. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Lidiya is married, her children are grown up and independent. Lidiya sells beautiful women's underwear on the central market of her hometown Novomoskovsk. Her merchandise is always tastefully selected for the customer who demands high quality. Lidiya has worked in this field for more than ten years.

Lidiya plans to use the loan in the amount of 15,000 hryvna to buy new styles of underwear and also renew the variety of pajamas. She hopes to add more variety and have an opportunity to offer a merchandise of higher quality to women of all ages and preferences. Lidiya is uniquely a businesswoman with taste who is stationed at her place and can select and offer good products.

loans.use: to buy new styles of underwear and also renew the variety of pajamas.

loans.name: Carlota Irma

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Carlota; es  casada, la socia tiene 65 años de edad; la socia tiene 3 hijos, la socia sigue trabajando en su negocio de panaderia,ella tiene un horno donde elabora panes y luego los vende en forma ambulatoria en la plaza del distrito de Oropesa,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de elaboracion y venta de panes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar pan como aceite y harina al por mayor y tambien para comprar leña para el horno.


La socia está muy agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho préstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
Carlota is 65 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She continues to work in her bakery.  She has an oven where she makes bread, which she later sells in a plaza in the Oropesa district.  She works from 8am until 5pm, and through this business she provides for her children.  She wants to expand and improve her business making and selling bread.  She requests a loan to buy supplies at wholesale to prepare bread, such as cooking oil and flour, and also to buy firewood for her oven.

She is very grateful for this loan, and she promises to make all of the payments on this loan in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make bread, such as cooking oil and flour, and also to buy firewood for her oven

loans.name: Kevin

texts.en:
Kevin was just 12 years old when he started working as an electrician's assistant to help support his family. They were low-income and his mother was a single parent. The middle child in a set of five, Kevin was the only sibling who took on a job at such an early age to contribute to the household. When he was just 25 years old, he started Spark Electric. He had to network with friends, borrowing equipment and a van, in order to get his foot in the door, but today he has no problem getting contracts, due to his excellent track record of providing top-of-the-line electrical, heating and A/C services.

Kevin says that being an entrepreneur and business owner is not always easy. Before he owned his own business, all he had to worry about was "money, cash, jobs, and tools." But now, as the boss, he is in charge of making bids and estimates, managing employees, and keeping all of the books. He has had to make mistakes in order to learn to seek advice and he believes that being "in the field" is the only way to improve, benefiting from trial and error.

The business has faced hardship in the past year because some larger companies try to take advantage of smaller ones like his by contracting them for work but then never paying them. "They see you as a small fish and feel that they are a shark. They want to eat you for dinner," he explains. In his field, businesses are not paid until the "rough-in," the point at which the majority of the installation work is done. Then the contractor will make sure the work is complete and pay Kevin. This means that Spark Electric needs a steady flow of working capital in order to operate. 

Kevin will use his loan to pay for tools and equipment that will allow him to take his jobs to that "rough-in" point. He is also excited that the Kiva loan will allow him to establish a strong line of business credit so that his business can grow. Kevin's dream is for Spark Electric to become a Fortune 500 company. He wants people to see that a minority graduate of a New Orleans public school can go on to do great things. "I hope that people can appreciate the love and labor I've put into it," he says. "This loan will help me have a peaceful mind and I won't have to toss and turn at night anymore." And as for his business motto, Kevin says he'd "rather show than tell," letting the quality of his work speak for itself.

After he has posed for his Kiva profile picture, Kevin takes off his hat and says he wants a last word: "Always believe in yourself. Have faith in God and trust. And in the midst of a busy and aggravating world, keep believing. Believe in all that you set out for, and that is going to keep you."

loans.use: to purchase materials and tools

loans.name: Ruslana

texts.ru:
Руслана замужем, у нее двое дочерей. Руслана предоставляет услуги парикмахера и параллельно является технологом-колористом в своем родном городе Никополе. Она работает в небольшом съемном помещении при местной бане, превратив его в уютную парикмахерскую. В этом районе больше нет парикмахерских, что способствует развитию бизнеса Русланы. Кроме отсутствия конкурентов на рост бизнеса повлияла помощь мужа и стремление самой Руслана к развитию. Сначала Руслана занималась торговлей, но потом поняла, что это не ее сфера и решила заняться парикмахерской. Этим делом она занимается пока только 2 года. Ее ежемесячная чистая прибыль составляет около 2 300 гривен. 

Руслана планирует вложить кредит КИВА в 8 000 гривен в оплату аренды помещения, которое она снимает для работы. По условиям аренды ей нужно оплатить аренду за полгода вперед. Кроме этого Руслана надеется купить необходимое оборудование для работы в своей парикмахерской, а также приобрести стеклянную витрину.  В планах Русланы превратить свою маленькую парикмахерскую в настоящий салон красоты. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Ruslana is married, she has two daughters.  Ruslana provides hair cutting services and is also a colorist in her hometown, Nikopol.  She works in a small rented space in the local bathhouse, having turned it into a cozy barber shop.  In this neighborhood there are no other barber shops, which helps the growth of Ruslana's business.  In addition to the lack of competitors the growth of the business has been effected by the help of her husband and Ruslana's own striving for growth.  In the beginning Ruslana worked in sales but then understood that this was not the right sphere for her and decided to start a barber shop.  She has been in this business for only 2 years so far.  Her monthly net profit is around 2,300 hryvnia.

Ruslana plans to invest the KIVA loan of 8,000 hryvnia into paying rent on the space that she leases for work.  Under the terms of her lease she needs to prepay the rent for half a year in advance.  In addition, Ruslana hopes to purchase necessary equipment to work in her beauty salon and to purchase a glass display.  Ruslana has plans to transform her small barber shop into a real beauty salon.

loans.use: to pay rent for the space that she leases for work and to purchase required salon equipment

loans.name: Helen Maria

texts.es:
Hellen es una mujer luchadora, tiene 45 años y vive con su familia, en una comunidad del distrito de Hatillo que es una zona urbana y residencial, sin embargo es objeto de una creciente actividad comercial, concentrada principalmente en los centros comerciales. Se ha ubicado gran cantidad de mueblerías, tortillerías, panaderías, librerías, talleres mecánicos y automotrices, gasolineras, dentisterías, farmacias, consultorios médicos, bares, restaurantes, tiendas e imprentas.

En este momento está pasando por una situación económica difícil, ya que es madre soltera. Y las entradas de dinero que tiene, no son suficientes para financiar la carrera de su hija.

Es por eso que Hellen está solicitando un crédito de 450,000.00 (cuatrocientos cincuenta mil colones), para cancelar el pago del cuatrimestre  de la carrera universitaria de su hija y finalizar el pago de una computadora. Ya que tienen sus expectativas familiares en ella para asi tener un futuro  y una vida mejor.

Hellen es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo, una de las 110 empresas de crédito comunal de EDESA en Costa Rica. Es su segundo préstamo con la Empresa y da muchas gracias por toda ayuda que le han brindado.
texts.en:
Helen is a determined woman. She is 45 years old and lives with her family in a community in the District of Hatillo, which is a urban and residential area. However, there is increasing commercial activity that is mainly concentrated in the business centers. Several types of businesses are located in those areas such as furniture shops, tortilla factories, bakeries, bookstores, auto repair and mechanic shops, gas stations, dental offices, pharmacies, health clinics, bars, restaurants, stores, and print shops.

At the moment, Helen is going through a difficult financial situation since she is a single mother. With the limited access to income that she has, there is not enough money to finance her daughter’s degree.

For this reason, Helen is requesting a loan of 450,000 CRC so that she can pay for a semester of her daughter’s university degree and to finalize the payment of a computer. There are expectations being placed on her daughter by family members so that she can have a future and a better life.

Helen is a member of the Communal Credit Enterprise of Hatillo, one of the 110 member organizations that make up EDESA in Costa Rica. This is her second loan with the organization and she is grateful for all of the help that has been provided.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's university expenses and to buy a computer.

loans.name: Ana Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora Ana del Socorro es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al comercio de perecederos. Este negocio lo inicio hace 10 años donde lo que comercializa principalmente es el pipián, ayote, chiltoma, tomate…etc.
Ella es casada y tiene tres hijos de los cuales solo el menor está a su cargo. Ella invertirá el crédito en insumos ya que en esta época el comercio sube.
texts.en:
Sra. Ana del Socorro is a hardworking and enterprising woman who sells perishable goods. She started this business 10 years ago and sells primarily squash, pumpkins, sweet peppers, tomatoes, and other products.

Ana is married and has three children, but only one is a dependent. She will invest this loan in merchandise since this is the season when her sales increase.

loans.use: to buy squash, pumpkins, sweet peppers, tomatoes, and other products.

loans.name: Eliseo Ramon

texts.es: Eliseo Ramón tiene 47 años, es casado y fruto de su unión tiene 2 hijos de 22 y 14 años de edad. Su actividad es la venta de granos básicos, Eliseo es un hombre muy entusiasta el disfruta obtener un medio de ingreso. El labora como empleado en el ingenio san Antonio fue con el paso del tiempo que empezó a implementar la venta de granos básicos con los mismos trabajadores. Eliseo se necesita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, maíz, concentrado entre otros.
texts.en:
Eliseo Ramón is 47 years old, married, and has two children (ages 22 and 14). He has a business selling dry goods. Eliseo is an enthusiastic gentleman who enjoys what he does for a living. He is an employee at a refinery in San Antonio, but in his spare time he started selling dry goods with his co-workers.

Eliseo needs a loan to invest in the purchase of rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn, concentrated foods, and other products.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, corn, concentrated foods, and other products.

loans.name: Peter

texts.ru:
Петр женат, у него двое взрослых детей. Петр – из Ивано-Франковска. С детства у него были золотые руки и он мог смастерить что угодно из дерева. В свое время Петр работал водителем, экспедитором на спиртзаводе. Потом, последовав совету товарища, решил начать свое дело. Уже 7 лет Петр занимается изготовлением корпусной мебели из ДСП на заказ. У него всегда есть заказы за счет постоянных клиентов и качественного исполнения работ. На данный момент его ежемесячный доход составляет 5 000 гривен. У Петра есть 1 наемный работник. В бизнесе во многом помогает то, что есть и свое транспортное средство (грузо-пассажирское авто - газель 1999 года).

Петр планирует вложить сумму кредита в 8 000 гривен в закупку необходимых материалов для производства мебели, а именно в приобретение плиты и мебельной фурнитуры. В ближайшем будущем Петр надеется приобрести новую легковую машину, чтобы удобнее и быстрее было ездить на встречу с клиентами. Петр очень любит свою семью и много вкладывает в благосостояние своих родных. Одним из интересных фактов может стать то, что совсем недавно дочь Петра стала призером чемпионата мира по легкой атлетике (бег на 200 метров и эстафета 4X100м).  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en: Peter is married and has two adult children.  Peter is from Ivano-Frankivsk.  Since childhood, he has had "golden hands" and was able to make anything from wood.  At another time, Peter worked as a driver, expediter at a spirits plant.  Then, after taking his friend's advise, he started his own business.  Peter has been involved in making furniture out of chipboard to-order for seven years.  He always has work orders due to having loyal customers and producing quality work.  Currently, his monthly income is 5,000 hryvnia.  Peter has one hired worker.  Having a means of transportation (a 1999 Gazel passenger van) also helps a lot in the business.  Peter plans to invest a loan in the sum of 8,000 hryvnia into a purchase of necessary materials for making furniture, specifically purchasing chipboard and furniture accessories.  In the near future, Peter hopes to buy a new passenger, so that it is easier for him to meet with clients.  Peter loves his family very much and invests a lot into the well-being of his relatives.  One of the interesting facts could be that recently Peter's daughter won a prize at a world championship in track and field (200 meter run and a 4x100 meter relay).

loans.use: purchase necessary materials for making furniture, specifically purchasing chipboard and furniture accessories

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей родом из Ивано-Франковска, Западная Украина. Он предоставляет услуги пассажирских перевозок и параллельно торгует подержанными автомобилями. Авто – это любимое дело Сергея и его главная страсть. В автобизнесе Сергей уже не первый год. За последние 10 лет он смог раскрутиться и сейчас его ежемесячный доход составляет 6 000 гривен. 

Сергею необходим кредит в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы осуществить текущий ремонт своего автомобиля и подготовить его к зиме, поменяв колеса, аккумулятор и т.п. Со временем Сергей надеется поменять авто на другое, приобретя более новое транспортное средство. Со временем Сергей надеется скопить достаточно денег и приобрести собственное жилье. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Sergei was born in Ivano-Frankivsk in the Western Ukraine. He provides passenger transportation services and also sells used cars. Auto is Sergei's favorite business and his ruling passion. It's not the first year that Sergei is in the auto business. During the past ten years he was able to develop it and now his monthly income is 6,000 hryvna.

Sergei needs a loan in the amount of 10,000 hryvna to realize the repairs for his vehicle and prepare it for the winter, change the tires, battery, etc. With time Sergei hopes to change the car to another one and buy a newer transportation vehicle. He hopes to save money in time to buy his own place to live.

loans.use: to realize the repairs on his vehicle and prepare it for the winter by changing the tires, battery, etc.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz  de 36 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Durán”.
El negocio de ella es la venta de cosméticos como: perfumes, desodorantes, cremas, etc.
Ella inicio esta actividad hace 3 años con la ayuda de una vecina. 
El horario de ella es de 9:00am hasta 16:00pm.
La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia y que a veces los clientes no le pagan en la fecha indicada, entonces esto la atrasas.
Tiene una hijo de 13 años, estudia en colegio público.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadería como: cremas, prendas de vestir, perfumes.
El sueño de ella es aumentar sus ventas y que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Luz is 36 years old and lives in a suburban area called Durán. She has a business selling cosmetics such as perfumes, deodorants, crèmes, and other products. Luz started this business three years ago with the help of a neighbor. Her schedule is from 9am to 4pm. The difficulty she must face is crime. Sometimes her customers do not pay on the date they promised, so this sets her back.

Luz has a 13-year-old son who attends a public high school. She is requesting a loan to invest in her business so that she can buy merchandise such as crèmes, jewelry, and perfumes. Her dream is to increase her sales so that her business can continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy crèmes, jewelry, and perfumes.

loans.name: Debora Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Debora Elizabeth es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora. Ella es docente desde hace 13 años y para ayudarse en los gastos vende distintos productos desde ropa, lácteos y trucha. Con el crédito comprara crema, mantequilla, zapatos, ropa de cama.
texts.en:
Sra. Debora Elizabeth is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She has been a teacher for 13 years. To help with her expenses, she also sells different products such as clothing, dairy products, and trout.

With this loan she will buy cream, butter, shoes, and bed sheets.

loans.use: to buy cream, butter, shoes, and bed sheets.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr:
Awa habite dans la région sud du sénégal,mariée avec 3 enfants qui sont tous à l'école franchaise.Pendant 10,elle fait le commerce et la couture.Awa achete des tissus en gros dans le grand marché de la ville,arriver dans son atelier,elle coud des robes de femme qu'elle vende à raison de 11000f le complet.
Awa soutien souvent sa famille avec ses bénéfices et veut augment le nombre d'employes dans son atelier car elle travail avec un employé.
texts.en:
Awa lives in the south of Senegal. She is married and has 3 children, who all go to the French School.  For 10 years, Awa has been working as a seamstress. She buys fabric wholesale at the town's grand market,then  takes the fabric back to her workshop where she makes women's clothing. She sells the clothes for 11,000 francs per outfit. 

Awa supports her family with the profit and wants to increase the number of employees in her workshop because at the moment there is only one.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothes that she can sell.

loans.name: Jose Octavio

texts.es:
José de 38 años, un hombre que empezó como comerciante por necesidad y falta de estudios que le impide conseguir trabajo en empresas.
Es comerciante minorista, vende artículos según la temperada.
Su actividad lo realiza solo, trabajaba de todos los días de la semana, inicia a las 8:00am hasta las 18:00pm.
Su dificultad es la delincuencia. Está casado, su esposa es ama de casa.
Tiene 4 hijos, uno de 3, 14, 18, 21, los dos adultos trabajan y los dos menores estudian en pública.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: papel higiénico, cepillos, lavacaras, etc.
Ya que con el préstamo anterior pudo invertir en el negocio y también pido hacer las paredes de su vivienda. 
Su sueño es terminar la construcción de su vivienda, le falta el piso y el portal.
texts.en:
When he was 38 years old, José started working as a merchant out of necessity because his lack of education prevented him from getting a company job. He is an informal merchant, selling products based on the season. José works alone every day of the week. He starts at 8am and finishes at 6pm.

The difficulty he must face is crime. José is married and his wife is a homemaker. They have four children (ages 3, 14, 18, and 21). The two adult children are working and the two younger children are in school.

José is requesting a loan to buy toilet paper, toothbrushes, wash basins, and other items. His previous loan was invested in his business, but he was also able to put up the walls in his house.

His dream is to finish the construction of his house, which lacks a floor and an entryway.

loans.use: to buy toilet paper, toothbrushes, wash basins, and other items.

loans.name: En El Nombre De Dios Group

texts.es:
El grupo en el Nombre de Dios está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Miriam quien tiene una fritanga desde hace 6 años. Ella con el crédito comparara sillas, mesas e insumos (granos básicos, carne, plátano…etc.)
Los otros integrantes son Ana María de 32 años quien vende productos Avon y Bismar comerciante de ropa usada.
texts.en:
The group “En El Nombre de Dios” (In the Name of God) consists of three hardworking and enterprising people.  One of them is Miriam, who has managed a fried foods restaurant for six years.  She will use her loan to buy chairs, tables, and supplies (basic grains, meat, plantains, and other items).  

The other members are Ana María, who is 32 years old and sells Avon products, and Bismar, who is used clothing merchant.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, and supplies.

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es: Segundina tiene 38 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a sus tres queridos ya que es padre y madre para ellos. Hace 03 años  abrió una tienda de abarrotes donde vende variedad de productos como: galletas, gaseosas, arroz, fideos, entre otros. Siendo su negocio muy concurrido por vecinos y amistades, que encuentran todo lo que necesita para su casa. Asimismo ello la considera como una madre ejemplar ya que une fuerzas para sostener sola a sus hijos. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder estar junto a sus hijos dedicarse constantemente a ellos. Desde que se entero que la institución MFP apoya a los más necesitados no dudo en participar y solicitar su crédito para poder incrementar más productos en su tienda. Este es su sexto crédito  solicitado con MPF, ha sido muy puntual en sus créditos anteriores y trabaja con responsabilidad sin causar problemas en su banco comunal. Con el préstamo solicitado, logrará incrementar más productos para su tienda como: galletas, fideos, azúcar, arroz, entre otros.
texts.en:
Segundina, age 38, is a hardworking woman who lives in her own home with her three beloved children. She already plays the role of both father and mother to them. Three years ago, Segundina opened a grocery store where she sells a variety of products such as cookies, sodas, rice, noodles, and other items. Her business is very busy with neighbors and friends who visit because they can find everything they need for their homes. In addition, Segundina is considered to be an exemplary mother because of the strength she has to support her children by herself. What she enjoys most about her work is being able to stay with her children, so she constantly devotes herself to them. Since joining the MFP organization, Segundina has not been hesitant to request the assistance that she needs. Therefore, she is applying for a loan so that she can increase the amount of products in her store.

This is the sixth loan she has requested from MFP. Segundina has been very punctual with her previous loans because she wants to work responsibly without causing problems for her Communal Bank. The loan she requested will be used to increase the inventory of her store. She will buy cookies, noodles, sugar, rice, and other products.

loans.use: to buy cookies, noodles, sugar, rice, and other products.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia tiene 56 años, es una mujer humilde y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a sus 06 queridos hijos  y lo que más desea es brindarles una mejor calidad de vida, para lo cual esta dispuesta a trabajar muy duro. Los productos que con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado cultivar Julia, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida que lleva 40 años realizando en el cultivo de sus productos. Todas las mañanas empieza a trabajar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembríos de cacao y palillo dependerá la calidad de los productos que obtenga. En tiempo de cosecha necesita el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes le ayudan en las extracciones de los productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy feliz cuando los ve crecidos y considera que lo más difícil, es llevar lo cosechado desde su chacra hasta el centro poblado de Rosario donde habita para poder vender a los centros de acopio que vienen al mismo pueblo a recoger la cosecha que produce. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo a futuro con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. Con el crédito solicitado comprará sacos de abono natural y fertilizantes para mejorar sus cosecha de cacao y palillo.
texts.en:
Julia, age 56, is a humble and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her six beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. For this reason, she is willing to work very hard. Through effort and dedication, Julia has been able to cultivate the crops that have helped her progress through life for the past 40 years. Every morning she begins her work in the fields since she knows that the quality of her cacao and turmeric crops depends on how much care she provides. At harvest time, she needs the help of workers to gather her crops. What she enjoys most about her job is caring for her crops because she feels happy when she sees them grow. She considers the most difficult part to be carrying her harvested crops from the fields to the central village of Rosario where they are sold at the collection centers. The people from her same town come to buy what she produces.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Julia knows that she must pay on time in order to access another loan in the future more easily and not create complications for her Communal Bank. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy sacks of natural compost and fertilizers so that she can improve her cacao and turmeric crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of natural compost and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ermenegildo

texts.es:
El señor Ermenegildo, está casado, tiene 51 años de edad, vive en la Ciudad de Curuguaty. Es comerciante, cuenta con una Tienda de Ropas Usadas, con 5 años de experiencia en el ramo. Comenta que tiene mucha clientela que siempre acude hasta su negocio, por lo cual tiene muy buenos ingresos.
Comenta que todo el esfuerzo que realiza es por darle a su familia todo para que tengan una vida digna y decorosa, sin privaciones como las que el tuvo que pasar. El se considera una persona trabajadora, luchadora y muy sacrificada.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas, con lo cual podrá abastecer su negocio y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
Ermenegildo, 51, is married.  He lives in the city of Curuguaty.  He’s a merchant.  He has a used clothing store with five years’ experience in this line of work.  He comments that he has quite a few customers who always come to his store so income is good.

He comments that all the effort he makes is to provide his family with everything they need to live a proper, dignified life without privations like the ones he had to undergo.  He considers himself a hardworking, tenacious, very self-sacrificing person.

He requests the loan to buy clothes to stock the store and meet customer demand.  He thanks the Fundación for the opportunity it gives him.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes to resell.

loans.name: Carmen Mercedes

texts.es:
Carmen, una señora trabajadora que a pesar de ser madre soltera ha podido salir adelante con la ayuda de Dios.
Con el préstamo anterior ha podido surtir su negocio e incrementarlo pero no tanto como ella esperaba.
Ahora ella solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertir más en su negocio, además ella quisiera comprar un local en donde podría expandir su negocio.
Su sueño es poder terminar su casa pero al 100%.
texts.en:
Despite being a single mother, Carmen is a hardworking woman who has been able to get ahead with help of God. With her previous loan she was able to restock and increase her business, but not as much as she expected.

She is now requesting a new loan so that she can invest more into her business. In addition, Carmen wants to buy a shop so that she can expand her business.

Her dream is to finish the construction of her house 100%.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her business.

loans.name: Mario Enrique

texts.es:
Mario tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a su mamá, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa al detalle ofertando de casa en casa, cuando él tenia 7 años de edad fallece su papá, por lo que con el apoyo de su mamá a logrado estudiar un Técnico en sistemas y redes informáticas, en una universidad de la zona oriental del país. Él se graduara el 21 de  noviembre de este año, por lo que siente muy contento de culminar una etapa importante en su vida, como trabajo de graduación él diseño una página Web. Mario con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado terminar sus estudios sus horarios son de 5:00 de la tarde a 8:00 de la noche de lunes a viernes y los sábados de 7:00 de la mañana a las 12:00 del medio día.

Él desde hace 14 años se ha dedicado al trabajo de reparación e instalación de aires acondicionados de vehículos, un amigo fue quien le enseño, puesto que lo llevo como ayudante cuando Mario tenia 13 años de edad, en el taller de su amigo trabajo durante cuatro años, después trabajo nueve años en otro taller y hoy en día trabaja de manera independiente junto con un amigo.

Los materiales para ejecutar sus trabajos los compran en empresas como oxgasa, situada  en la ciudad, el gas de refrigeración lo compran con amigos de otros talleres en empresas que distribuyen en la zona central del país, de esta forma bajan los precios de compra.

Mario esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para el pago del arrendamiento (deposito por uso) de un cilindro con nitrógeno industrial, para el uso en el taller. Con esto él tendrá el equipo necesario disponible para ser utilizado cuando sea requerido en su taller, ya que en este momento no lo posee, y cuando lo necesita utiliza el de un amigo. Teniendo el suyo podrán realizar trabajos competitivos y por consiguiente lo recomendaran nuevos clientes.

Mario esta próximo a cumplir uno de sus sueños el graduarse de Técnico en sistemas y redes informáticas, también desea ser propietario de su propio taller de servicio de reparación y mantenimiento de aires acondicionados de vehículos, equipos residenciales y empresariales. Él reconoce que requiere de inversión y que es una meta a largo plazo para poderla alcanzar, pero esta dispuesta a lograrla.
texts.en:
Mario is 27 years old, single and living with his mother.  She sells clothes at retail from house to house.  When he was seven years old, his father died.  With help from his mother he was able to study to become an information systems technician at a university in the east of the country.  He will graduate on November 21 of this year.   He feels very happy to have completed such an important phase in his life.  As his final graduation requirement he designed a web page.  Mario has managed to complete his studies with much effort and dedication having attended classes Monday through Friday from 5pm to 8pm and Saturdays from 7am to noon.

For the last 14 years he’s been working repairing and installing car air conditioning systems.  A friend taught him how having taken him on as a helper when Mario was 13 years old.  He worked in his friend’s shop for four years and then for nine years in another shop.  Today, he works independently with a friend.

He buys the supplies he needs to do his jobs in firms like Oxgasa located in the city.  The refrigerant gas they buy from distribution firms in the central part of the country together with friends in other shops in order to reduce the purchase price.

Mario is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to pay the rental fee (deposit) on a cylinder of industrial nitrogen to use in his shop.  With this, he’ll have the necessary equipment on hand to be used when required in the shop since at present he does not have it and he needs to use a friend’s.  Having his own will allow him to be competitive and to have new customers recommended to him.

Mario is about to complete one of his dreams on graduating as a communication networks technician.  He also wants to own his own vehicle air conditioning systems repair and service shop.  He realizes that he needs investment and that this is a long-range goal to be reached, but he’s ready to reach it.

loans.use: to pay for the rental of a cylinder of industrial nitrogen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to service and repair his vehicles

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío, es madre soltera de 26 años, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su único hijo Frank, de 09 años a quien desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Rocío, es una mujer muy trabajadora, hace 03 años que se dedica a la venta de frutas que produce en la chacra de sus padres, quienes le dan ese apoyo para que pueda seguir adelante y  educar tranquilamente a su hijo. Rocío nos manifiesta que en temporada de frutas como: pacay, mango, piña, plátano, entre otros; los lleva a vender a la ciudad de Ayacucho donde sus clientes quedan satisfechos con las frutas que les lleva, pues son frutas deliciosas que produce en los campos de cultivo ubicada en la localidad de Rosario. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede solventar los gastos de su hijo y considera que lo más difícil es tener que viajar y tener que dejar a su hijo. Con el tiempo, Rocío, piensa sembrar más semillas de frutas para que pueda llevar mayor cantidad a la ciudad de Ayacucho ya que ahí se encuentran sus principales clientes. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además está conforme con su banco comunal, ya que todos cumplen con sus compromisos de pago. Con el crédito solicitado de 2,000 nuevos soles comprará semillas de frutas como: mango, naranja, plátano, entre otros; para poder sembrar en su campo de cultivo.
texts.en:
Rocio is a 26-year-old single mother who lives in her parents' house with her only son Frank, aged 9, for whom she wishes to provide a better quality of life. Rocio is a very hard-working woman who 3 years ago began selling fruit she produced on the farm of her parents', who provided this help so she could get ahead and educate her child in a normal way. 

Rocio tells us that it is the season for fruits, such as mango, pineapple, and plantain, among others. She takes them to sell in the city of Ayacucho, where customers are very satisfied with the fruit she brings. This is because the fruit produced in the fields around Rosario are so delicious.

What Rocio likes most about her work is being able to cover her son's expenses. She thinks the most difficult part is having to travel and leave her son behind. In time, Rocio hopes to plant mO. fruit seeds in order to take a larger quantity to the city of Ayacucho, where her principal customers are located.

This is Rocio's 3rd loan through MFP and she promises to comply with her schedule of payments. She is also very fond of her communal bank, since everyone complies with their commitments to repay. With the 2,000 new sols she is requesting, Rocio will purchase fruit seeds, including mango, orange and plantain, among others, to sow on the farm.

loans.use: buy mango, orange and plantain seeds to plant.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cleaning products (bleach, detergent, soap).

loans.name: Victoriano Reynolds

texts.es:
Victoriano es más conocido en la zona el nombre de Reynolds, el cual es su segundo nombre, tiene 68 años y vive con su familia en una comunidad del distrito de Hatillo que es una zona urbana y residencial, sin embargo es objeto de una creciente actividad comercial, concentrada principalmente en los centros comerciales. Se ha ubicado gran cantidad de mueblerías, tortillerías, panaderías, librerías, talleres mecánicos y automotrices, gasolineras, dentisterías, farmacias, consultorios médicos, bares, restaurantes, tiendas e imprentas.

Desde hace unos meses que Victoriano tiene como proyecto, hacer unos cambios en su hogar, pero no ha podido ya que ha tenido problemas económicos, lo cual quiere decir que se le hace muy difícil realizar su proyecto por financiamiento propio.

Es por eso que Victoriano está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de 325,000.00 (trescientos veinticinco mil colones), para la compra de materiales de construcción para asi mejorar su hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Victoriano es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo, una de las 110 empresas socios de EDESA en Costa Rica. Y nos indica que este es su segundo préstamo, lo cual lo tiene muy feliz y está muy agradecido con la Empresa por toda ayuda que le han brindado.
texts.en:
Victoriano is better known in his area by his second name, Reynolds.  He is 68 and lives with his family in a village in the Hatillo district, an urban and residential zone.  However,  it has a lot of  businesses, particularly in the commercial centers.  Located there are many furniture stores, tortilla stores, bakeries, bookstores, auto shops and auto dealers, gas stations, dentists, pharmacies, doctors’ offices, bars, restaurants, stores and printers.

Some months ago Victoriano had as a project to make some changes in his house, but he hasn’t been able to accomplish them because he has had financial problems.  That is, it is very difficult for him to do these projects with his own money.

That is the reason that Victoriano is requesting a loan of 325,000 (three hundred and twenty-five thousand colons) to buy construction materials for improving his home and giving his family a better quality of life.

Victoriano is a member of Hatillo communal bank, one of the 110 businesses that is part of EDESA in Costa Rica.  He tells us that this is his second loan and he is very happy and appreciative with the bank for the help it has offered.

loans.use: to improve his home

loans.name: Tania

texts.es: Tania es una mujer joven de 26 años, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su pequeña hija Valentina, a quien le brinda amor de padre y madre. Tania es un ejemplo de madre a seguir, pues trabaja arduamente para su pequeña hija. Hace 01 año empezó a trabajar en el cafetín del colegio de su localidad; donde además vende caramelos, galletas, refrescos, entre otros. Ella se levanta muy temprano para estar en su cafetín junto a su pequeña hija. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder estar tranquila junto a su hija a quien le dedica su tiempo mientras espera el recreo de los alumnos para poder atenderlos. Con el tiempo piensa incrementar mas productos para su cafetín y dejar satisfechos a sus principales clientes quienes son los alumnos y docentes de la escuela. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, asegura que aportará puntualmente su cronograma de pagos y agradece a los socios de su banco comunal por permitirle trabajar junto a ellos. Con el crédito solicitado, comprará productos para abastecer su cafetín como: galletas, caramelos, gaseosas, entre otros.
texts.en: Tania is a 26-year old single mother who lives with her parents and her young daughter Valentina. Tania is an exemplary mother; she works very hard for her little girl. A year ago she started to work at a food stand inside the local high school. She sells candy, cookies, soda, and other goods. She wakes up very early to work at the food stand, and she brings her daughter with her. Her favorite part of her job is the free time she has with her daughter while they wait for the students' breaks. She hopes to offer more variety at her food stand in order to satisfy her clients who are the students and teachers at the school. This will be her first loan with MFP, and she pledges to make her payments punctually and is thankful to her fellow community bank members for giving her the opportunity to work with them. With the loan she will purchase products to restock her food stand like: cookies, candies, sodas, and other products.

loans.use: Comprar galletas, caramelos y gaseosas.

loans.name: Sandra Del Socorro

texts.es: La Señora Sandra tiene 55 años, ella tiene el negocio de venta de nacatamales, mini pulpería y elaboración de güirilas, inicio hace 8 años este negocio fue con el tiempo que empezó a vender estos productos y al ver la buena afluencia de clientes decide seguir adelante con este medio de vida. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de maíz, hojas, bolsas, leña, comal, entre otros productos. Su meta es ampliar su negocio y mejorar cada día más el servicio de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Sandra is 55 years old.  She has a business where she sells tamales, has a mini general store, and makes corn pancakes.  She started this business 8 years ago and  began to sell these products, and when she saw the influx of customers, she decided to continue moving ahead with this means of living.

The loan that she is requesting is for the purchase of corn, leaves for wrapping the tamales, bags, and firewood, among other things.

Her goal is to expand her business and each day improve her customer service.

loans.use: to buy corn, leaves for wrapping tamales, bags, and firewood among other things.

loans.name: Nonvignon 2 Group

texts.fr: NONVIGNON 2 est un  groupement composé de seize personnes qui vivent toutes dans le même quartier au Bénin. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupement sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, afin d’élever le niveau de leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. La représentante du groupement  du nom de Bernadette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Bernadette est âgée de 53 ans et vit dans une ville du Bénin. Bernadette  est une veuve ayant deux enfants, tous scolarisés, dont un n’est plus à sa charge. Bernadette vit avec l’enfant qui lui reste à charge et assure seule ses différentes charges. Bernadette a très peu fréquenté l’école. Depuis une vingtaine d’année, Bernadette  vend des tissus de différentes sortes par le système de distribution. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à ainsi subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de l’enfant à charge. Bernadette  s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Ce crédit permettra certainement à Bernadette  et aux autres membres du groupement NONVIGNON 2, de rehausser leur activité et d'accroître leur chiffre d'affaire et leur revenu.
texts.en:
NONVIGNON 2 is a group made up of sixteen people all living in the same neighborhood in Benin.  This is the second time that the group has requested a loan through ALIDé, in order to increase their business activity and better respond to their customers' needs.  The group representative, named Bernadette, has her hand raised in the photo.  Bernadette is 53 years old and lives in a city in Benin.  She is a widow with two children, both of whom have had an education, and one of whom is still under her care.  Bernadette lives with the child still under her care and pays for all his expenses.

Bernadette had very little formal education.  For about twenty years, she has been selling different types of fabric through a distribution system.  This business has helped her to meet her expenses and those of the child still under her care.  Bernadette buys her stock in a market in Benin.  This loan will help her and other members of the NONVIGNON 2 group to grow their businesses and increase their profits and income.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Cornelia Emelda

texts.es:
La Sra. Cornelia es soltera, vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo. Tiene hijos, los cuales son todos ya mayores de edad. Posee una despensa la cual explota hace ya un buen tiempo, está bien surtida, lo cual atrae a clientes de todos lados.
Comenta que le va muy bien, por lo que le gustaría poder seguir trabajando en su despensa. Ella se considera como una mujer trabajadora, luchadora y por sobre todo muy sacrificada.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, panificados y demás artículos, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener más lleno su negocio. Agradece a la Fundación por esta oportunidad y también a Kiva.
texts.en:
Cornelia is single living in the city of San Lorenzo.  She has children who are all adults now.  She has a grocery store that she’s been operating for quite some time now.  It is well-stocked which attracts customers from all over.

She comments that she does well and would like to continue working in her store.  She considers herself to be a hardworking, tenacious but, above all, a self-sacrificing woman.

She requests the loan to buy foodstuffs, beverages, baked goods and other items to stock up and have the store fuller.  She thanks the Fundación and Kiva also for this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Josefa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Josefa está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Josefa del Carmen des 48 años quien tiene una comidera  desde hace 4 años  ella inicio con unos ahorros vendiendo pequeñas piezas de pollo a hora vende pollo entero. Ella es soltera y tiene un hijo el cual ya es mayor de edad.

Las otras integrantes son Martha de 23 años quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 4 años y María quien vende sandalia, adornos y ropa.
texts.en:
The "Josefa" group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising women.

One of them is Señora Josefa del Carmen, aged 48, who has had a food stall for the last four years.  She started off by using some savings, and selling small pieces of chicken.  Now she sells whole chickens.  She is single, and has one grown son.

The other members are Martha, aged 23, who has had a grocery store for the last four years, and María who sells sandals, accessories and clothes.

loans.use: to buy chicken.

loans.name: Nelly Margarita

texts.es:
Nelly de 56 años, ha seguido con su negocio de gabinete, en la cual le ha ido muy bien con el préstamo anterior y  con la ayuda de Dios ha salido adelante.

Ahora ella solícita un nuevo préstamo para el incremento de su negocio comprando cemento, arena y comprar tintes  donde quiere poner otro local del mismo negocio pero en otra parte de la urbe.

Su sueño es q sus negocios crezcan en donde ella pueda brindar empleo, también  en donde ella pueda tener ingresos económicos muy bueno.
texts.en:
Nelly is 56 years old.  She has continued with her small business, which has been going very well for her.  With her previous loan and the help of God, she has been able to make progress.

She is now requesting a new loan to extend her business by buying cement and sand, and purchasing hair dye.  She wants to open a second premises in the same line of business, but in a different part of the city.

Her dream is that her businesses will grow to the extent that she can provide employment to others, and also so that she will have a very good income.

loans.use: para incrementar su negocio comprando cemento, arena y comprar tintes

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa tiene 52 años y vive con su familia, en una comunidad del distrito de Hatillo que es una zona urbana y residencial, sin embargo es objeto de una creciente actividad comercial, concentrada principalmente en los centros comerciales. Se ha ubicado gran cantidad de mueblerías, tortillerías, panaderías, librerías, talleres mecánicos y automotrices, gasolineras, dentisterías, farmacias, consultorios médicos, bares, restaurantes, tiendas e imprentas.

En este momento sus ingresos económicos son muy escasos, lo cual indica que sus  entradas de dinero no son suficientes para financiar la carrera de su hija.

Es por eso que Josefa está solicitando un crédito de 200,000.00 (doscientos mil colones), para pagar los estudios de su hijo. Ya que los miembros de la familia tienen sus expectativas futuras en él para asi una vida mejor.

Josefa es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo, una de las 110 empresas de crédito comunal de EDESA en Costa Rica. Es su segundo préstamo con la Empresa y da muchas gracias por toda ayuda que le han brindado.
texts.en:
Josefa is 52 years old and lives with her family in a community in the district of Hatillo.  This is a residential urban area, however it is a location of growing commercial activity concentrated primarily in the commercial centers.  There are many furniture stores, tortilla stores, bakeries, bookstores, mechanics and automotive workshops, gas stations, dentists, pharmacies, medical offices, bars, restaurants, stores and printers.

At this time, Josefa's income is very limited, and she states that the money she has coming in is not sufficient to pay for her son's degree.  This is why Josefa is requesting a loan for 200,000 (two hundred thousand) colones to pay for her son's education.  Her family members have high expectations for his future and his having a better life.

Josefa is a member of the Communal Bank of Hatillo, which is one of EDESA's 110 communal banks in Costa Rica.  This is her second loan with the bank, and she gives great thanks for all the support that has been offered to her.

loans.use: to pay for her son's university education.

loans.name: Filipenses 4:13 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Felipenses 4:13 está integrado por tres per personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. El coordinador del grupo es José Antonio de 25 años quien tiene un negocio variado desde la venta de fruta, sopa y comida con unos ahorros. Él está casado y tiene una bebe de 5 meses.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son Rosa Ramona quien vende ropa usada desde los 14 años se dedica a este negocio y Rosa Argentina de 47años se dedica al comercio de golosinas y jugos.
texts.en:
The "Filipenses 4:13" ("Philippians 4:13") is made up of three hard-working and enterprising individuals.  The coordinator of the group is José Antonio, aged 25, who has some savings from his business selling a variety of things such as fruit, soup and food.  He is married and has a 5 month old baby.

The other members of the group are Rosa Ramona who has been selling second-hand clothing for the last 14 years, and Rosa Argentina, aged 47, who works selling candy and juice.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, meat, cheese, chicken, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal and onion.

loans.name: Areli

texts.es: Areli es sotera de 29 años y hace seis años compro una casa en la que vive ella con sus papas,  para ella lo mas importante hoy en día no es el casarse y formar una familia si no el apoyar a sus papás en que ellos tengan mejor calidad de vida puesto que ellos son personas ya de la tercera edad y requieren de comodidades mayores a las de una persona en edad media, Areli se preocupa mucho por ellos y quiere recompensar de alguna manera todo lo que ellos le dieron durante su infancia y juventud hablando de cosas materiales como los alimentación, un techo donde vivir cómodamente, educación y lo mas importante el amor. Ella requiere levantar una barda en la parte de atrás de su casa para que cuando sus papas estén solos tengan seguridad de que nadie podrá entrar a su casa y ocasionar daños en el patio o robo de algún artículo que se encuentre en el patio. Para comenzar con la construcción necesita cemento, arena, varillas y pagar a la persona que hará el trabajo.
texts.en:
Areli is single and 29 years old.  Six years ago, she bought a house where she lives with her parents.  The most important thing in her life today isn't getting married and having children, but helping her parents to have a better quality of life.  Her parents are elderly and need more comforts than middle-aged people.  Areli is very concerned about them and wants in some way to give back to them everything that they gave her during her infancy and younger days.  By this, she means material things such as food, a roof over her head where she could live in comfort, education, and most importantly, love.

She wants to put up a fence behind her house so that when her parents are on their own, they can have security.  No-one will be able to enter the house and cause damage to the yard or steal anything that's in the yard.  

In order to start construction, she needs cement, sand, and posts, and to pay for someone to do the work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Jorge Alejandro

texts.es:
El Joven Jorge tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapeguá. El empezó a trabajar con su padre en la producción y ventas de productos hortícolas, actualmente con la ayuda de su padre ya tiene montado una pequeña gomería en el centro mismo de la ciudad y ya cuenta con muy buena clientela.
Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo ahora está ampliando su gomería y así logra atraer a más clientes y a mantener a los que ya tiene. Dentro de sus objetivos está seguir creciendo económicamente y comercialmente. El se define como un joven muy trabajador, luchador y emprendedor.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de una compresora de aire, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda en su taller.
texts.en:
Jorge, 23, is a single young man living with his mother in the city of Carapeguá.  He started out working with his father producing and selling horticultural products.  Currently, with help from his father he has set up a small tire repair shop downtown and he already has a very good clientele.

Thanks to his work and effort he’s expanding the tire shop to attract more customers and keep his present ones.  Within his objectives is to continue growing economically and commercially.  He defines himself as a hardworking, tenacious and enterprising young man.

He requests the loan to buy an air compressor which will be of much help in his shop.

loans.use: to buy an air compressor.

loans.name: Franklin Rafael Israel

texts.es:
Franklin  tiene 75 años y vive con su familia, en una comunidad del distrito de Hatillo que es eminentemente urbano y residencial, sin embargo es objeto de una creciente actividad comercial, concentrada principalmente en los centros comerciales. Se ha ubicado gran cantidad de mueblerías, tortillerías, panaderías, librerías, talleres mecánicos y automotrices, gasolineras, dentisterías, farmacias, consultorios médicos, bares, restaurantes, tiendas e imprentas.

Desde hace meses que Franklin tiene como proyecto, hacer unos cambios en la infraestructura de su casa, pero no ha podido ya que ha tenido problemas económicos, lo que quiere decir que se le hace muy difícil realizar su proyecto por financiamiento propio.

Es por eso que Franklin está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de 400,000.00 (cuatrocientos mil colones), para la compra de materiales de construcción para asi mejorar su hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Franklin es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo, una de las 110 empresas socios de EDESA en Costa Rica. Y nos indica que este es su tercer préstamo que la Empresa le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Franklin is 75 years old and lives with his family in a community in the Hatillo district, which is predominantly urban and residential.  However, the area has seen growth in commercial activity, mainly in the shopping centers.  A large number of furniture stores, tortilla makers, bakeries, stationery stores, mechanical and automotive workshops, gas station, dentists, pharmacies, medical offices, bars, restaurants, shops and publishers have located there.

For a few months now Franklin has been planning to make some changes to the infrastructure of his house, but he hasn't been able to do it because of financial problems.  This meant that it became very difficult to carry out his plans with his own funds.

For this reason, Franklin is requesting a loan in the sum of 400,000 colones to purchase construction materials so that in this way he can make the improvements to his house and provide his family with a better quality of life.

Franklin is a member of the Hatillo communal bank, one of the 110 banks that are members of EDESA in Costa Rica.  He tells us that this is the 3rd loan that has been provided to him as a member of this bank.

loans.use: to fix up his house

loans.name: Somasse-Glotomey Group

texts.fr: SOMASSE-GLOTOMEY est un  groupement composé de quatorze personnes qui vivent toutes dans le même quarter et mènent toutes des activités génératrices de revenus. C’est la première fois que ce groupement sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, afin d’élever le niveau de leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. La représentante du groupe du nom de  Aimée est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo.  Aimée est âgée de 32 ans et est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Paul. Le couple a trois enfants, tous à leur charge. Seulement certains des enfants sont scolarisés. Le couple se partage ensemble les diverses charges de la famille.  Aimée n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour subvenir à ses différents besoins et contribuer aux charges familiales,  Aimée vend depuis une quinzaine d’année des épices et des produits divers dans sa région.  Aimée s’approvisionne au Bénin.  C’est la première fois que  Aimée et les autres membres du groupement  SOMASSE-GLOTOMEY sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé, crédit qui leur servira à rehausser leur activité.
texts.en:
SOMASSE-GLOTOMEY is a group composed of 14 people who all live in the same district and all work at income-generating activities. This is the first time that the group has asked for a loan from ALIDé in order to raise the level of their activities and better respond to the needs of their clientele. The representative of the group, Aimée, is the one who is raising her hand in the photo.  

Aimée is 32 and married to a carpenter named Paul. The couple have three children, all still in their care. Only some of the children are enrolled in school. The couple share in supporting the family. 

Aimée did not attend school. In order to support herself and contribute to the family income, Aimée has been selling spices and various other products from her region for about 15 years. She buys her merchandise in Bénin.  Aimée and the other members of her group called SOMASSE-GLOTOMEY are requesting a loan from ALIDé to improve their businesses.

loans.use: to buy spices and various products.

loans.name: Sixta Irene

texts.es:
La señora Sixta tiene 41 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. ropas en un salón, está casada con el Sr. Domingo D. 45 años , quien se dedica a la reparación D. relojes y joyas, el cual le ayuda con los gastos familiares, ellos tienen dos hijos.
Sixta inició su actividad hace más D. 20 años, vendiendo ropas con su suegra, después ella empezó su negocio en forma ambulante recorriendo casa por casa, por la ciudad y luego D. esto y gracias al dinero que pudo juntar abrió su propio local D. venta con muy buena ubicación, y hoy en dia cuenta con clientela formada y les provee a los vendedores ambulantes en la actualidad. Es muy valorada por su actitud emprendedora, pues desD. muy joven se ha dedicado a la venta D. dicho producto, gracias a eso y a su buena administración está pudiendo tener una mejor calidad D. vida.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. prendas, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y a la vez abastecer a los demás proveedores.
texts.en:
Sixta, 41, has a clothing store.  She’s married to Domingo, 45, who is a watch and jewelry repairman and helps her cover household expenses; they have two children.

Sixta started her work more than 20 years ago selling clothes with her mother-in-law.  Later she started selling door to door throughout the city and after that and thanks to money she was able to save she opened her own store in a good location.  Today, she has a well-established clientele and she supplies the city’s street vendors.  She is very well-liked because of her enterprising attituD. because she’s been selling this product since a very young age.  Thanks to that and her good management she’s being able to have a better quality of life.

The loan will be used to buy clothes to stock up and also to stock other sellers.

loans.use: to buy clothes for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Gaudy Group

texts.es:
El grupo Gaudy está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Gaudy de 35 años  quien desde hace 4 años se dedica a la venta de comida rápida. Ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos de 14  y 5 años los cuales estudian la mayor en sus tiempos libres le ayuda en el negocio.
Las otras integrantes  son Norma de 29 años quien vende fresco y fritanga desde hace 3 años y Karen de 23 años tiene una barbería unisex desde hace dos años aproximadamente.
texts.en:
The "Gaudy" group is made up of 3 hardworking and enterprising people.  One of these is Gaudy, who is 35, and has had a business selling fast food for 4 years.  She is single and has 2 children aged 14 and 5.  Her oldest child is in school and helps her with the business in her free time.  

The other members of the group are Norma, 29, who has been selling fresh and fried foods for 3 years, and Karen, 23, who has had a unisex salon for about 2 years.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, cooking oil, bread, etc.

loans.name: Leonilda

texts.es:
Leonilda tiene 73 años y vive con su familia, en una comunidad del distrito de Hatillo que es eminentemente urbano y residencial, sin embargo es objeto de una creciente actividad comercial, concentrada principalmente en los centros comerciales. Se ha ubicado gran cantidad de mueblerías, tortillerías, panaderías, librerías, talleres mecánicos y automotrices, gasolineras, dentisterías, farmacias, consultorios médicos, bares, restaurantes, tiendas e imprentas.

Leonilda tiene como meta, el poder hacer unos cambios para mejorar su casa, pero no ha podido ya que ha tenido problemas económicos, lo que quiere decir que se le hace muy difícil realizar su proyecto por financiamiento propio.

Es por eso que Leonilda está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de 400,000.00 (cuatrocientos mil colones), para la compra de materiales de construcción como block, arena, entre otros, para asi mejorar su hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Leonilda es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo, una de las 110 empresas de crédito comunal de EDESA en Costa Rica. Es su primer préstamo con la Empresa y da muchas gracias por toda ayuda que le han brindado.
texts.en:
Leonilda is 73 years old and lives with her family in a community in the Hatillo district, which is quite urban and residential. However, it is also an area of growing commercial activity, chiefly concentrated in the shopping centers. Many furniture stores, tortilla shops, bakeries, bookstores, repair workshops, auto repair shops, gas stations, dentists, pharmacies, medical clinics, bars, restaurants, stores and print shops have opened here. 

Leonilda has the goal of making some changes to improve her house, but she has not been able to do so since she has had economic problems; in other words, it has been very difficult for her to carry out her project with her own funds. 

For this reason, Leonilda is requesting a loan in the amount of 400,000 (four hundred thousand) colones, to buy construction materials such as concrete blocks and sand, among others, in order to improve her home and provide her family with a better quality of life. 

Leonilda is a member of the Hatillo communal bank, one of EDESA's 110 communal credit organizations in Costa Rica. This is her first loan with the organization, and she gives many thanks for all the support provided to her.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Luis es soltero, trabajador y perseverante en su lucha diaria de salir adelante con trabajo y esfuerzo; vive en casa de sus padres y se dedica a prestar el servicio de taxi en su moto; por todo el cercado de Ica. El crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en el mejoramiento de su vivienda (compra de muebles y mesa), su principal desafío del Sr. Luis es el trabajo arriesgado que realiza ya que él presta el servicio hasta altas horas de la noche, su sueño del Sr. Luis es tener su propia casa y vivir independientemente de su familia. El esta muy agradecido por el crédito otorgado ya que con ello va a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is single, hardworking and persevering in his daily struggle to get ahead through work and effort.  He lives in his parents’ house and works providing mototaxi services throughout Ica’s surroundings.

The granted loan will be used to make some home improvements (to buy furniture and a table).  

Luis’ main challenge is that his work is risky in that he has to provide service until quite late at night.  His dream is to have a house of his own and to live independent of his family.  He is very grateful for the granted loan because it will help him improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy furniture and a table.

loans.name: Fifa Christon Group

texts.fr: Le groupement FIFA CHRISTON est formé de vingt cinq personnes qui habitent toutes dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Amelin Alphonsine est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Amelin Alphonsine est âgée de 55 ans, et est mariée à un douanier du nom de Valère. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous à leur charge. Amelin Alphonsine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Depuis une vingtaine d’année, Amelin Alphonsine  vend des ustensiles de cuisine par le système de distribution ; ce qui permet d’assurer ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la famille. Amelin Alphonsine achète ses produits au Bénin et au Togo. C’est la deuxième fois que Amelin Alphonsine et les autres membres du groupement FIFA CHRISTON sollicitent un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit leur permettra de renforcer leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The group FIFA CHRISTON is made up of 25 persons who all live in the same district in Bénin. The representative of this group, Amelin Alphonsine, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Amelin Alphonsine is 55 and married to a customs agent named Valère. The couple have four children, all living under their roof. 

Amelin Alphonsine did not go to school. For about 20 years, she has been selling kitchen utensils through the distribution system, allowing her to help her husband support their family. Amelin Alphonsine buys her products in Bénin and in Togo. It's the second time that she and the other members of the group called FIFA CHRISTON are requesting a loan from ALIDé. This loan will permit them to expand their businesses so as to be better able to respond to the needs of their clientele. The first loan was correctly reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Lisbellia Viviana

texts.es: La Sra. Lisbellia es casada, tiene un hijo de 1 año de edad, ella es una mujer trabajadora, luchadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y tiene una pequeña librería, eligió este tipo de negocio ya que le gusta el comercio, lleva trabajando alrededor de 1 año, gana semanalmente S/ 494 nuevos soles. La Sra. Lisbellia  va a invertir el crédito otorgado en la compra de más mercadería (ropa) para la temporada primavera- verano. Sus sueños de Lisbellia  es tener una librería bien grande y dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Ella esta muy agradecida por la confianza depositada en su persona ya que con el crédito otorgado va a poder mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Lisbellia is married and has a one-year-old son.  She is a hardworking, tenacious woman with a strong desire to get ahead.  She sells clothes and has a small stationery shop.  She chose this business because she likes commerce.  She’s been working about a year and earns 494 new soles per week.

Lisbellia will use the granted loan to buy more merchandise (clothes) for the spring-summer season.  Lisbellia’s dream is to have a larger stationery shop and to provide her family with a better quality of life.  She is very grateful for the trust placed in her since the loan will help her improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge es un joven trabajador, que se esfuerza todos los días por sacar adelante a su familia, es casado tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 1 año de edad; él se dedica a prestar el servicio de taxi en su moto, ya lleva trabajando en este servicio por mas de 2 años; eligió este tipo de trabajo porque le gusta transportar a las personas, gana semanalmente S/ 250 nuevos soles. El crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en el mantenimiento general de su moto ya que por el uso diario esta sufriendo unos imperfectos. Su principal sueño del Sr. Jorge es tener su propio auto y dar una buena educación a sus hijos. El esta muy agradecido  por el crédito otorgado ya que con ello va a poder arreglar su moto y así seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is a hardworking young man who strives daily to support his family; he’s married and has two children who are 3 and 1 year old.  He provides mototaxi services and has been working for over two years.  He chose this type of work because he likes to transport people.  He earns 250 new soles weekly.

The granted loan will be used to provide general maintenance to his mototaxi because due to daily use it’s starting to have some mechanical problems.   Jorge’s main dream is to have a car of his own and to provide his children with a good education

He is very grateful for the granted loan because he’ll be able to repair his mototaxi and continue to work to support his family.

loans.use: to service his mototaxi.

loans.name: Olinda Blanca

texts.es: La Sra. Olinda es casada, ella es una mujer perseverante, luchadora y empeñosa en querer progresar cada día mas, la Sra. Olinda se dedica a la venta de menestras y abarrotes en un puesto en el mercado central; donde trabaja todo el día con ayuda de sus hijos, la Sra. Olinda va a invertir el crédito otorgado en la compra de mercadería (menestras y abarrotes) para surtir su puesto y así tener mayores ventas. Su principal sueño de Olinda es tener su propia casa y darles una educación de calidad a sus hijos. Ella esta muy agradecida por el crédito ya que con ello va a mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Olinda is married.  She’s a persevering, tenacious, enterprising woman who wants to progress more each day.  She sells foodstuffs and groceries in a stand in the central market where she works all day with help from her children.  

Olinda will use the granted loan to buy merchandise (food and groceries) to stock her stand and increase sales.  

Olinda’s main dream is to own a house and provide her children with an education.  She is very grateful for the loan because it will help her improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle

loans.name: Elba Juliana

texts.es:
La señora Elba tiene 49 años D. edad, está casada con el señor Dario D. 53 años, tienen 4 hijos D. 25, 20, 20 y 11 años D. edad, los mayores están en la universidad y el menor aún esta en edad escolar, viven el centro D. la ciudad D. Itá.
La señora Elba tiene un salón D. belleza en su domicilio hace más D. 30 años, allí realiza a sus clientes todo tipo D. servicios D. belleza como corte, tintes y peinados, cuenta con apoyo económico D. su marido quien posee una curtiembre en la ciudad D. Yaguarón hace varios años. La señora Elba es una señora muy responsable y profesional en su trabajo, busca siempre la excelencia en su actividad.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. tintes para cabello, esmaltes, shampoo, enjuague y otros productos. Agradece a la Fundación Paraguaya y a Kiva por la oportunidad recibida para seguir creciendo en su vida profesional.
texts.en:
Elba, 49, is married to Darío, 53, and they have four children, ages 25, 20, 20, and 11.  The older ones are in the university and the youngest is still in school.  They live in the center of the city of Ica.
