José has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizers to improve his land and his crops.  He will also buy nutritionally-balanced feed for his animals.  His aim is, through his harvests, to obtain more money for his family.  In spite of the difficulties that he faces, José continues working with a lot of effort so that he can continue improving in life and providing other opportunities to his children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to improve his farmland and crops, and to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for his animals

loans.name: Kantuta Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KANTUTA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Achacachi, está compuesta por diez integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Dionicia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, comercio, venta de calzados, venta de artículos varios, venta de ropa. 

La señora Dionicia  indica que es el primer ciclo que integra Pro Mujer  por invitación de la promoción. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de zapatos que viene trabajando desde hace quince años atrás.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su mercadería (compra de zapatos) que comprará de la ciudad de La Paz  y lo comercializa en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta salud.
texts.en:
The “Kantuta” communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Achacachi Center.  It has 10 members led by a governing board headed by Dionicia.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses.  Among them we have: food sales, commerce, shoe sales, assorted merchandise sales and clothing sales.

Dionicia says that this is the first cycle she’s joined in Pro Mujer having been invited through a promotion.  She sells shoes at present, a business she’s had for the last 15 years.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase merchandise.  She will buy shoes in the city of La Paz to then sell in her sales stand.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family in the best way possible since she’s married and has a son.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Melania Aurora

texts.es:
Doña Melania sigue con su venta de ropa ambulante,  de oficio costurera, pues ha logrado la captacion de clientes, en donde vende y cumple con los encargos que le hacen, entre electrodomestico, cosmetico y ropa, teniendo mejores utilidades, para ayudar  a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Su esposo trabajando como conductor , sus hijos, dos laboran en construccion y el menor estudia, 
Entre las dificultades,  ha tenido enfermo a su hijo menor, con convulciones, lo que ha tenido que gastar mas dinero y ha salido menos tiempo con sus ventas. 
Con su credito anterior logro mejorar la parte delantera de su casa en pared de concreto, hoy con este nuevo financiamiento comenzara la construccion de un cuarto en la parte de atrás, que tambien le servira como tapia, ya que la que tiene es del vecino y muy delicado, es por tal razon hara construccion, dando a sus hijos comodidad de espacio y privacidad.
texts.en:
Melania continues working as a street vendor of clothes.  She’s a seamstress by profession and has acquired customers to sell to and to fill orders for items they request like home appliances, cosmetics and clothes.  Her profits have improved to help her family with household expenses.  Her husband works as a driver and two of her children work in construction and the youngest is still in school.  One of her difficulties has been that her youngest son has been sick with convulsions and she’s had to spend more money and has had less time available to go out to sell.

She used her previous loan to improve the front part of her house with a concrete wall.  Now, with this new loan she’ll start to build a room in the rear which will also serve as a rear wall because the one that’s there now is her neighbor’s and it’s very flimsy.  Because of this she’ll do the construction providing her children with more space and privacy.

loans.use: to build a room.
